topic.title: Generating WSDL Documentation in a Custom Format

keywords.indexterm: WSDL documentsGenerate documentation for WSDL documentsCustom format

body.p: To obtain the default HTML documentation output from a WSDL document, uses an intermediary XML document to which it applies an XSLT stylesheet. To create a custom output from your WSDL document, edit the wsdlDocHtml.xsl XSLT stylesheet or create your own.The wsdlDocHtml.xsl stylesheet that is used to obtain the HTML documentation is located in the /frameworks/wsdl_documentation/xsl folder.The intermediary XML document complies with the wsdlDocSchema.xsd XML Schema. This schema is located in the /frameworks/wsdl_documentation folder.
When using a custom format, you can also copy additional resources into the output folder or choose to keep the intermediate XML files created during the documentation process.
